He missed four recent games with a sore knee, but played 32 minutes against the Kings in his second game back, making 6-of-14 shots and adding five rebounds, three assists and three steals. All my life I've been watching him play and to have the opportunity to play him was fun, said Kings guard Sergio Rodriguez, who was matched up against Allen Iverson at times.
